quotes.quote: The best way to find yourself is to lose yourself in the service of others.
At his best, man is the noblest of all animals; seperated from law and justice he is the worst
It is not the strongest of the species that survive, nor the most intelligent, but the one most responsive to change.
We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.
Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.
The mass of men lead lives of quiet desperation. What is called resignation is confirmed desperation.
He who opens a school door, closes a prison.
TThe future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall and learning from it.
